definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The simulation of high-frequency multibeam sonar image is the main task in the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨多波束聲納圖像的仿真是本文的主要任務。

sentences.english: Multi-beam display is an important means of target detection in digital sonar.
sentences.chinese: 數字式聲納的多波束顯示是檢測目標的重要手段。

sentences.english: The Doppler Velocity Log(DVL) simulation system for the underwater vehicle has been built in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了水下機器人的多普勒測速聲納仿真系統。

sentences.english: A real-time obstacle-avoiding expert system based on a multibeam forward looking sonar is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於多波束前視聲納的實時避障專家系統。

sentences.english: Anti-sub warfare is based on sonar and acoustic detection of underwater craft.
sentences.chinese: 反潛戰的基礎是聲納和水下聲波探測技術。

sentences.english: Detecting submarine by means of dipping sonar is main mode of helicoptersearching and tracking submarine.
sentences.chinese: 使用吊放聲納探測潛艇是直升機反潛的主要樣式。

sentences.english: Also the Ocra whales would have been detected by the Russian sonar if they were nearby.
sentences.chinese: 而且，如果食人鯨接近潛水艇，聲納會發現他們。

sentences.english: The frequencies used in sonar systems vary from infrasonic to ultrasonic.
sentences.chinese: 聲納所使用的頻率從次聲到超聲不等。

sentences.english: A sonar array is a radar towed behind a ship that listens and locates underwater sounds.
sentences.chinese: 聲納陣列雷達拖着船舶偵聽和位於水下聲音。

sentences.english: It will deploy a number of technologies to reduce its sonar signature.
sentences.chinese: 該潛艇使用了一系列技術來降低自身的聲納信號。

sentences.english: SONAR quarantines files that are already excluded.
sentences.chinese: 聲納隔離那些已經排除的文件。
有人研究過納米聲納沒？

sentences.english: A crucial issue in a passive sonar system is detection of the spectral lines.
sentences.chinese: 在被動聲納系統中，線譜檢測是一個至關重要的問題。

sentences.english: It is of practical guiding significance for submarine fighting against dipped sonar.
sentences.chinese: 這對潛艇規避對抗吊放聲納搜索具有實際的指導意義。

sentences.english: The article introduced the portable side - scan sonar .
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種便攜式側掃聲納。

sentences.english: The most he heard, from sonar echoes in 1997, was very like a whale.
sentences.chinese: 1997年通過聲納回聲聽到的最多的極像一隻鯨魚。

definition: to monitor/to keep an eye on

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
